definitions.definition: A solemn promise to do something.

subdefinitions.definition: A promise to abstain from drinking alcohol .

definitions.definition: An asset or person temporarily handed over to guarantee the fulfilment of something promised , under threat of permanent loss of the thing handed over; surety , security , hostage .
A bailment of personal property to secure payment of a debt without transfer of title.

subdefinitions.definition: The personal property so pledged, to be kept until the debt is paid.

definitions.definition: A person who has taken a pledge of allegiance to a college fraternity , but is not yet formally approved.
